items.title: Extreme heat hitting Northeast, West: Latest on the scorching temperatures
items.description: Extreme heat is hitting both coasts, bringing dangerously high temperatures to the Northeast, Northwest and Southwest.

items.title: Trump's remarks on homelessness in DC spark concerns among homeless advocates
items.description: President Donald Trump vowed this week to rid Washington, D.C., of homeless encampments, though what those plans will look like are unclear.

items.title: Coast Guard suspends search for fisherman after boat with 4 crew members capsizes

items.title: WATCH:  Supreme Court formally asked to overturn landmark same-sex marriage ruling

items.title: WATCH:  Welcome to Emmy the Labrador's neighborhood
items.description: A Labrador in Southern California has gone viral on TikTok after her owner trained her to ring a special doorbell so she can visit their neighbors.
